cause.description:
This is a cause to help stop the sread of AIDS through awareness and education about dangers of AIDS
1. AIDS must be stop or we won't be able to control it.
2. Actions must be taken now or never.
3. Millions die daily,but we can prevent that.
4. THE JOURNEY BEGINS NOW!!!!!
cause.mission: Help stop the spread of AIDS in Africa and the entire world
cause.name: WE CAN STOP AIDS IN AFRICA!!!!
